title: Russian banks turn to China to sidestep cutoff from payments systems - Fox Business
content: Russian banks turn to China to sidestep cutoff from payments systems  Fox BusinessView Full Coverage on Google News
description: Russian banks that have been cut off from global payments networks are turning to Chinaâ€™s state-owned UnionPay system as the country tries to sidestep boycotts by Western businesses for its invasion of Ukraine.
